pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Delta-utils## Installation```pip install delta-utils```## To deploy to PyPIFirst increase the version number in pyproject.toml (e.g. 0.0.13 -> 0.0.14)```bashpython3 -m pip install --upgrade buildpython3 -m buildpython3 -m pip install --upgrade twinetwine upload --skip-existing dist/*```
